messages.subject: The inmates are running the asylum
messages.msgSnippet: Well, I had heard they wanted mandatory preschool but this is beyond ridiculous!!!! Lynda ... In a message dated 6/28/01 12:16:26 AM Central Daylight Time,
messages.messageBody:
Well, I had heard they wanted mandatory preschool but this is beyond ridiculous!!!!

Lynda
----- Original Message -----

In a message dated 6/28/01 12:16:26 AM Central Daylight Time,
lurine@... writes:



Have you listened to the latest from the Post Turtle and his keepers???
Mandatory preschool!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Starting at age (sit down) . . .
THREE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Lynda


----- Original



Its even worse than that. Take a look at this:

D.C. council seeks compulsory school for 2-year-olds
----------
About half of the District of Columbia's 13 council members
support a new proposal that would force children as
young as two into school. "I was struck by the fact that
so many young children enter elementary school totally
unprepared to learn," said proposal sponsor Democrat
Councilman Kevin Chavous, on National Public Radio.
(06/27/01)
http://wnd.com/news/article.asp?ARTICLE_ID=23419
